ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Stun/root
ygData.msgSnippet: so Broon used to stop running at 25% with chain/fear, but then a little higher in level it was at 50%?  guess i should know better than to dispute John! ;)
ygData.messageBody:
so Broon used to stop running at 25% with chain/fear, but then a little
higher in level it was at 50%? guess i should know better than to dispute
John! ;)

i've never noticed anything other than at 50% myself, i wonder what level it
is if it changes.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> I distinctly recall this not being the case early on because
> once in Cazic, I tried to Chain a green guard (stupid group
> wasn't all fighting the same target), and he ended up getting
> far enough away to aggro enough mobs to force us to zone. I
> also used the chain/fear combo on Broon whenever I passed
> through EK, and was somewhat surprised when he suddenly
> stopped running at 50% as opposed to the 25% or so I'd grown
> used to.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
